name: Fictional Town
description:
Ada finds herself in a strange town. She believes that everything is someone else's dream. 

Some of those she meets also believe that they are not in the real world. Others believe their world is real and try to convince Ada of that. 

Ada will have to find out what is happening here and try to get out into reality, if reality exists, of course.

Fictional Town is an pixel art atmospheric narrative-driven game. Beat 'em up fights against groups of enemies and Rhythm-based boss battles await you.
